review_text: 시장안에 홍콩반점이 있다닛..! 여기는 다른 홍콩반점이랑 다른점은 탕수육 반접시가 없내요
translated_review: There's a Hong Kong Banjeom inside the market..! Unlike other Hong Kong Banjeom locations, this place doesn't offer a half-plate of sweet and sour pork.

review_text: 여기 맛있어요. 평균 이상하는 집입니다. 고기도 많이주고요.
translated_review: The food here is delicious. It's above average. They also give generous portions of meat.
